summary: A security expert is sent to a remote scientific camp to investigate strange things that are happening.
cast: Adrian Paul|Amanda Douge|Anthony Waller|Caroline Couret-Delegue|Bruno Andreis|Pierre Cognet|Thierry Goron|Adel Kallel|Attila Szûcs|Nicholas Waller|Kate Nauta|David Story|Andrew Ryback|Arcadiy Golubovich|Yousef Amin|Meredith Ostrom|Madelaine Dixon|Brandon Dallmann|Jutta Kleinschmidt|Adrian Lukis|Ahmed Hafiane|David Collard|Clelie Saint-Val|Wajden Turki
title: El Infierno bajo Tierra
